title: Present Simple
description: We use the present simple for routines and facts.

title: Articles: a / an
description: Use 'a' before consonant sounds, 'an' before vowel sounds.

title: Verb To Be
description: Learn how to use 'am', 'is', and 'are' in sentences and questions.

title: Subject Pronouns
description: I, you, he, she, it, we, they – use them correctly in context.

title: Possessive Adjectives
description: my, your, his, her, its, our, their – show ownership.

title: There is / There are
description: Describe existence or presence of things using singular and plural.

title: This / That / These / Those
description: Point to things near or far in space and number.

title: Imperatives
description: Give basic instructions and commands: 'Sit down!', 'Be quiet.'

title: Prepositions of Place
description: Learn how to describe position: on, in, under, next to, behind.
